Who: Tuscon, Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Area just outside the location of the Black fortress

> "CYCLONUS!"
>
> His voice thunders like a high magnitude quake.

OOC: Don't forget, in Message #69950 Hydras commanded that the base be
sank, so at the moment all Tuscon and crew can see is a rather large
pit of molten lava where the fortress used to be. At least that is the
discription I have of it. There is suppose to be a secret door
somewhere, but from my understanding of it, you cannot spot it without
having prior knowledge of it, and it can only be opened from the
inside, or via remote control.

BIC:

"Tuscon." Cyclonus' calm voice transmited over a general communication
channel, "I see you have undergone a change since we have met last."
Dignity and a cool humor laced Cyclonus' voice, although there is an
undertone of respect or perhaps curiousity as well. "Hydras is the
commander of this facility. Have you come to serve the Predacon
military or perhaps give your life as we serve it?"

(TAG)

Preston
